column5:
Hello, 
 
I hope this e-mail finds you well. 
I represent Datrock company ( https://datrock.co/ ), we deal with data delivery and web scraping for b2b segment. 
 
Perhaps we’d be useful for you. If you are interested in lead generation, getting product data from the eCommerce websites or custom data from any website, just contact us and we’ll help you. 
 
This is a complete list of what we do: 
- Competitor prices monitoring for retailers 
- Product reviews monitoring for manufacturers 
- Lead generation and mining b2b contacts 
- News monitoring and content scraping 
- Mobile applications scraping 
 
Really looking forward to hearing from you.
